title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 31 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 31 2021
description:
EIB Guest Host Michael Berry talks about gratitude, health and his tremendous weight loss- and takes listener calls- 


EIB Guest Host Michael Berry takes listener calls including from Pastor Denny in Kansas who criticized Michael for attacking people on the left- and Michael had some choice words in his defense.


EIB Guest Host Michael Berry takes listener calls and talks about who a potential President Kamala Harris might name as VP - including Gov. John Bel Edwards (D-LA) 


EIB Guest Host Michael Berry announces that legendary stage and screen actress Betty White has passed away at 99 - and takes listener calls... 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
